sentence.Network_en: The country is frighteningly close to possessing nuclear weapons.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个国家离拥有核武器只有一步之遥，这令人不寒而栗。

sentence.Network_en: They pleaded guilty to possessing material likely to incite racial hatred.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们表示认罪，承认拥有可能煽动民族仇恨的材料。

sentence.Network_en: He has been blacklisted since being convicted of possessing marijuana in 1969.
sentence.Network_cn: 他自从1969年因持有大麻而被定罪后就被列入了黑名单。

PerfectNetExp.abs: No one worth possessing Can be quite possessed., 没有一个值得拥有的人被人完全占有.

entry.def: If you possess something, you have it or own it.

example.ex: He was then arrested and charged with possessing an offensive weapon...
example.tran: 他随后被逮捕，并被控拥有攻击性武器。

example.ex: He is said to possess a fortune of more than two-and-a-half-thousand million dollars.
example.tran: 据说他拥有超出25亿美元的财富。

entry.tran: 具备，具有（特定品质、才能等）
entry.def: If someone or something possesses a particular quality, ability, or feature, they have it.

example.ex: ...individuals who are deemed to possess the qualities of sense, loyalty and discretion...
example.tran: 被认为具备了理性、忠诚和判断力的人

example.ex: This figure has long been held to possess miraculous power.
example.tran: 这个数字长时间以来都被认为拥有神奇的力量。

entry.def: If a feeling or belief possesses you, it strongly influences your thinking or behaviour.

example.ex: Tsvetayeva was possessed by a frenzied urge to get out of Moscow.
example.tran: 茨维塔耶娃内心有一种想要离开莫斯科的狂热冲动。

entry.tran: （表示惊讶）是什么驱使…（干…），是什么促使…（做…）
entry.def: If you ask what possessed someone to do something, you are emphasizing your great surprise that they have done something which you consider foolish or dangerous.

example.ex: What on earth had possessed her to agree to marry him?
example.tran: 究竟是什么让她同意嫁给他的？

auth_sentence.content: The intention of anybody possessing a firearm is irrelevant.

auth_sentence.content: There is near universal opposition to Iran possessing nuclear weapons.
